text:
The #COVID19 pandemic has disproportionately affected communities of color, yet due to (justified) mistrust, they are the most hesitant to be vaccinated. I want to show that I #TrustTheScience and the #vaccine is #safe and #effective. 

#ProtectYourCommunity #Protectyourfamilies https://t.co/xRqiIkEIM9
